entry.title: Jekyll Starter!
entry.content:
This is a Jekyll Starter project, based on Lanyon, to quickly set up a blog using Jekyll. This bootstrap project includes social integration using AddThis for sharing and author following across many social media platforms. Integration with Google Analytics is also built in, using Google Analytics superProxy.

This project also includes tag visualization in each post, and as a consolidated tag based archive.

A grunt based build is included, which currently supports CSS minification and merging - for faster loading of the blog.


Read entire post...
